scripts.build: yarn copy-src && NODE_ENV=production vue-cli-service build --target lib --config vue.config.js --name orangevue ./index.js && cp dist/orangevue.css dist/style.css && yarn copy-fonts-dist
scripts.copy-src: rm -rf src && mkdir src && cp -R ../storybook/vue/src/components src/ && cp -R ../storybook/vue/src/directives src/ && cp -R ../src/scss src/scss && cp -R ../src/vendor src/vendor && cp -R ../src/fonts src/fonts
